kobe.KBpointings.galaxies.savep¶

galaxies.savep(self, filename, filetype='npz', split=' ', data=None, keys=['n', 'ra', 'dec', 'name', 'dist', 'mag'], **kwargs)¶

save tilings to a file

Parameters
filenamestring

name of file

filetypestring

type of file options: txt (plain text), npz (pickle file), fits (astropy.fits)

wdirstring

working directory for file

splitstring

if filetype is txt, the string defined to split each lines default: ‘ ‘ (space)

Examples

>>> from kobe import galaxies
>>> a = galaxies()
>>> a.generate(limdec=[-20,90])               
>>> a.savep('tmp.npz', filetype='npz')

sn_data_analysis: sdapy
